name: Auxilium Technology
description:
Auxilium Technology is a woman-owned small business and employee-owned company located in Maryland and Virginia. We deliver engineering training, consulting, research and service to executives, managers, developers, test professionals and quality engineers worldwide. Auxilium Technology real world, innovative, current hands-on international experience and field-proven methodologies is here to assist you with solving your day to day engineering/technical issues.
With decades of experience in engineering management, hardware engineering, software engineering, system engineering test/quality engineering and training, we offer the real world approach and the highest ROI. Our team is educated and trained in engineering and delivery of products/services of any size. With outstanding project management, even the most complex problems can be solved by our team. We have designed our internal processes to provide our customers with the highest value and quality, ensuring our relationship today and in the future.
